# This file has been generated by the add_job script
math(EXPR NUM_OUT_RECORDS_NUM "${NUM_OUT_RECORDS}" OUTPUT_FORMAT DECIMAL)
math(EXPR NUM_SSL_CTX_NUM "${NUM_SSL_CTX}" OUTPUT_FORMAT DECIMAL)
if (NUM_SSL_CTX_NUM GREATER NUM_OUT_RECORDS_NUM) 
  set(NUM_OBJ "${NUM_SSL_CTX_NUM}")
else()
  set(NUM_OBJ "${NUM_OUT_RECORDS_NUM}")
endif()    
if (NUM_OBJ GREATER 8) 
  set(UNROLL_BOUND "${NUM_OBJ}")
else()
  set(UNROLL_BOUND 8)
endif()
set(USE_OWNSEM 1)
add_library(ssl_msg_write_records_ownsem_harness STATIC
  ssl_msg_write_records_ownsem_harness.c)
target_compile_definitions(ssl_msg_write_records_ownsem_harness PRIVATE MBEDTLS_SSL_VARIABLE_BUFFER_LENGTH)
target_compile_definitions(ssl_msg_write_records_ownsem_harness PRIVATE USE_OWNSEM=${USE_OWNSEM})  
target_compile_definitions(ssl_msg_write_records_ownsem_harness PRIVATE NUM_OUT_RECORDS=${NUM_OUT_RECORDS})
target_compile_definitions(ssl_msg_write_records_ownsem_harness PRIVATE NUM_SSL_CTX=${NUM_SSL_CTX})

target_include_directories(ssl_msg_write_records_ownsem_harness
  PRIVATE ${MBEDTLS_DIR}/include/
  ${MBEDTLS_DIR}/library/
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/seahorn/include/
  ${SEAMOCK_ROOT}/include)
sea_link_libraries(ssl_msg_write_records_ownsem_harness ssl_mod_ownsem_msg.opt.ir)
sea_link_libraries(ssl_msg_write_records_ownsem_harness seahorn_mbedtls_util_ownsem_lib.ir)
sea_overlink_libraries(ssl_msg_write_records_ownsem_harness ssl_msg_write_records_ownsem_env_c.ir)
sea_overlink_libraries(ssl_msg_write_records_ownsem_harness ssl_msg_write_records_ownsem_env.ir)
configure_file(sea.yaml sea.yaml @ONLY)
sea_attach_bc(ssl_msg_write_records_ownsem_harness)
sea_add_unsat_test(ssl_msg_write_records_ownsem_harness)
